text: Eadgyþ seo hlauedi Eadwardes kynges lefe gret al þat hundred at Wedmore frendliche.

And ich cyþe eow þat ic habbe gegefen Gyso biscop þat land at Merkerun & alch þare þinga þæs þe þar mid richte to hireð into his canonican æt Sancte Andrea æt Wyllan mid saca & mid socna swo full & swo forð swo hit me sylfen on honde stod for Eadwardes kynges sawle & for mine sawle.
And ic bidde eow þat ge deme me richtne dom of Wudemann þe ic min hors bitachte & mi gauel haueð ofhealden six gear eiðer ge hunig & eac feoch.
